title: LoLClient and its memory issues
body:
I sign into LoL and find that, before even queuing for a game, the client uses 400mb of RAM.
Is something really clogged up in the LoLClient just on my computer, or is the client just this inefficient that it needs to hold onto so much memory for nothing?

replies.body:
god dammit apple

and it gets even funnier when you realise that League didn't have Mac support until late after its release

The client is based on Adobe AIR, try updating the AIR libraries first. I do not have this problem but it sounds like under your config you have a memory leak somewhere. But yes AIR does need a lot of resources.
